message.ca: We collect and process personal information as described in our Privacy Policy. Under CCPA, you have the right to know what personal information we collect and to opt-out of its sale.

basicStudy.description: Simple sequential review of all cards in the deck. Perfect for initial learning or quick review sessions.

info.description: Spaced repetition is a learning technique that increases intervals of time between subsequent review of previously learned material. It's scientifically proven to improve long-term retention and reduce study time.
info.title: About Spaced Repetition

spacedRepetition.description: Intelligent scheduling based on the SM-2 algorithm. Cards are shown at optimal intervals for long-term retention.
spacedRepetition.subtitle: Recommended
